review:
Hello, Alexander, thank you for your feedback. We are very sorry that your opinion has changed.
In two years, nothing has changed in the process of cooking khinkali: no weight, no dough recipe, no amount of minced meat. We still prepare khinkali according to the TECHNOLOGICAL CARD and we follow the cooking technology very strictly. The weight of the finished product has always been indicated in the menu, and 2 years ago, and now 1 khinkali weighs 80 grams.
In our work we use only the freshest certified products. Every morning we prepare fresh minced meat from selected meat for cooking khinkali and also follow the cooking technology: the weight of the meat, the composition of spices are the same as 2 years ago.
We really hope that your mood will change and we will be happy to see you again!
